nml_option.name: config_AM_pondDiagnostics_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member pondDiagnostics is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pondDiagnostics_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pondDiagnostics_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the pondDiagnostics analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pondDiagnostics_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_pondDiagnostics_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: pondDiagnosticsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the pondDiagnostics analysis member.

var.name: meltPondArea
var.description: Melt pond area fraction in a grid cell

var.name: meltPondAreaFinalArea
var.description: Melt pond fraction for the final area of sea ice at the end of each timestep

var.name: meltPondDepth
var.description: Melt pond depth in a grid cell weighted by area fraction of each thickness category

var.name: meltPondDepthFinalArea
var.description: Melt pond depth in a grid cell weighted by area fraction of each thickness category at the end of each timestep

var.name: meltPondLidThickness
var.description: Melt pond refrozen lid thickness in a grid cell weighted by area fraction of each thickness category

var.name: meltPondLidThicknessFinalArea
var.description: Melt pond refrozen lid thickness in a grid cell weighted by area fraction of each thickness category at the end of each timestep

var.name: meltPondDethCategory
var.description: meltPondDepth for each thickness category of sea ice
